original_text: And they smote all the souls that were therein with the edge of the sword, utterly destroying them: there was not any left to breathe: and he burnt Hazor with fire.
korean_text: 그 가운데 모든 사람을 칼날로 쳐서 진멸하여 호흡이 있는 자는 하나도 남기지 아니하였고 또 하솔을 불로 살랐고

sentences.original_text: And they smote all the souls that were therein
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그 안에 있는 모든 영혼을 쳤고

sentences.original_text: with the edge of the sword
there was not any left to breathe
and he burnt Hazor with fire
